modName: Werewolf Race Eyes SkyRe Races module patch
summary: This patch makes work correctly Werewolf Race Eyes by Grantiz with SkyRe Races module by T3nd0.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][b][center][color=#980000]INSTALLATION AND LOAD ORDER[/color]

This Patch requires that you have installed Skyrim Redone Races module and Werewolf Race Eyes mod (links for original mods are in Credits)

NMM:
1. Install with NMM
2. Load after SkyRe_Races.esp and WerewolfRace.esp in your load order
3. Play

Manual:
1. Extract Files to Desktop or whatever you use for temporary
2. Tick Patch esp in your load order and load it after SkyRe_Races.esp and WerewolfRace.esp
3.Play

[color=#980000]CREDITS:

[/color]T3nd0 - SkyReRaces Module (SkyRE and PerMa) - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286/?]T3nd0's Skyrim Redone[/url]
Grantiz - Werewolf Race Eyes mod - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29114/?]Werewolf Race Eyes[/url][/center][/b]
author: XeNoN Sirxon

files.name: SkyRe Races Module Werewolf Race Eyes Patch
